Entry.English:
Devout members of the {FAMILY-2} family have spent weeks exerting pressure on our royal engineers. They desire the construction of link(IMPROVEMENT_CATHEDRAL_ORTHODOX,2) to house the growing number of worshippers.
Do we relent to this pressure?

An Apostle named Andrew preaches a new religion in {CITY-0}. He claims to come from the West. He calls himself Protokletos, the first-called to Jesus, and thus preaches the True Word of Jesus of Nazareth.
What do we do?

What do we do?
